title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs packaged as a single Go binary with a REST/CLI API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client (PyPI: ollama) with sync/async generators for chat, embed, pull, push, etc.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”) with user auth, RAG, plugins.

title: open-webui
summary: Successor to ollama-webui; batteries-included UI for Ollama with plugin store, voice input, model builder.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick chat, model listing, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (Maven Central) with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat, generate code, or refactor using any Ollama model from within the editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval and generation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker-cuda
summary: Official CUDA-enabled container images (AMD64/ARM64) published to Docker Hub under ollama/ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm, or Q&A via any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama chat as a slash command or DM with thread support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama chat, image-caption and /model switcher to any Discord server.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot (Go) with streaming replies, group whitelist, and per-user model locks.

title: ollama-on-bentoml
summary: BentoML service template to serve Ollama models behind a scalable REST/gRPC endpoint with adaptive batching.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles (Llava, CodeLlama-70B-Instruct, SQLCoder, etc.) ready for ollama pull.
